page.title: 14My Home and my Family.
page.content: There are three altogether living in my home -Mum,Dad and myself.We live in a 6 roomed bungalow with 2 bedrooms , bathroom,kitchen,sittingroom and hall.The bungalow is joined to 3 more council bungalows in Pound Piece.In my bedroom there's a wooden desk, a bed covered with a "duve" quilt and a stereo recordplayer.In the kitchen we have a microwave and an ordinary oven.The sittingroom is furnished with a pinewood cupboard and coffee table, a suite of furniture patterned with brown swirls.There is also a large lampstand.We have a shower aswell as a bath in the bathroom.The back garden is small but it contains a greenhouse and a fishpond with 9 fish.On the otherside of the fence is the football field and farm fields beyond that.My Dad is a farmworker and my Mum is a domestic help at the Old Vicarage.
